text:
Becoming a 
parent usually brings changes 
to your home life, social life 
and relationships. Parents of a 
new baby experience a variety 
of emotions after the birth. 
You will feel happy and proud 
of yourself, and probably very 
relieved that it is all over.
Whether	this	is	your	first,	
second	or	third	baby,	the	first	
few weeks of parenthood 
are both physically and 
emotionally tiring. It can 
be	difficult	to	find	time	for	
yourself, your partner or your 
family when you have the  
24-hour
